channel.title: Comments on: Tsumo nemadimikira (ii)
channel.description: A detailed history of the Shona people of Zimbabwe

item.title: By: Shylet
item.dc:creator: Shylet
item.description: Ko tsumo idzi tingadziisa mumapoka akaita sei kana tichida kudzidzisa vana
item.content:encoded: Ko tsumo idzi tingadziisa mumapoka akaita sei kana tichida kudzidzisa vana

item.title: By: ruvimbo

item.description: shona is a good langauge all of us can understand thank you
item.content:encoded: shona is a good langauge all of us can understand thank you

item.title: By: SENKUD

item.description: I think we need the meaning of each TSUMO so that we understand it, Thank you
item.content:encoded: I think we need the meaning of each TSUMO so that we understand it, Thank you

item.title: By: netsai honyerwa
item.dc:creator: netsai honyerwa
item.description: Dimikira rokuti kutungana kwembudzi inorevei ?
item.content:encoded: Dimikira rokuti kutungana kwembudzi inorevei ?

item.title: By: frank
item.dc:creator: frank
item.description: Tsumo yokuti kufa kwedora inopedzeswa ichiti kudii? Tsumo yokuti kupa huturika inopedzeswa ichiti kudii?
item.content:encoded:
Tsumo yokuti kufa kwedora inopedzeswa ichiti kudii?
Tsumo yokuti kupa huturika inopedzeswa ichiti kudii?

item.description: Shona is a very good language You can hear your own language

Shona is a very good language

item.title: By: Tichaona Tyne Tichivangani
item.dc:creator: Tichaona Tyne Tichivangani
item.description: Thank you sir, Its a rich addition to a collection for my daughter who is doing grade four and having difficulties with Shona. Thank you greatly

item.title: By: Ntombiyekhaya
item.dc:creator: Ntombiyekhaya
item.description: also multilayered in meaning Like your statement Chamu if you think just a few seconds how “mauya” can give that question over five different answers

item.title: By: chamunorwa

item.description: shona is very rich its a language that you hear words of respect such as maswere here?VaChikuse mauya here?e.t.c
